description: Detects VB DLL's loaded by an office application. Which could indicate the presence of VBA Macros.
author: Antonlovesdnb
false_positives: Legitimate macro usage. Add the appropriate filter according to your environment
name: VBA DLL Loaded Via Office Application
query: (process.executable.text:("*\\excel.exe" OR "*\\mspub.exe" OR "*\\onenote.exe" OR "*\\onenoteim.exe" OR "*\\outlook.exe" OR "*\\powerpnt.exe" OR "*\\winword.exe") AND dll.path:(*\\VBE7.DLL OR *\\VBEUI.DLL OR *\\VBE7INTL.DLL))
